summary:
Supply Chain executive with strong strategic and business acumen and extensive global experience in operations, gained with Unilever in UK, France & Brazil and Danone in the Netherlands. A proactive, result oriented leader, with proven ability to build and develop high performing teams, to achieve business targets in a dynamic changing environment. Expertise in integrated supply chain planning (S&OP leader in the second largest Unilever business Unit), strategic planning, manufacturing footprint design and project management, including innovation and value creation projects. Ability to work effectively with cross functional teams at all levels leveraging strong cultural awareness, to drive value realization and execution of structural transformation initiatives. 

Specialties: 
Global NPD management and SC set up
S&OP Planning, Demand Planning
Project Management, capacity and strategic planning
Innovation Business Case development
Capital Expenditure planning
Manufacturing network/sourcing definition

profile_positions.description: Lead the execution of all central projects (innovation, productivity and secure) within the 3PM organisation through a team of project leaders. Support local 3PM teams to ensure innovation and productivity projects are delivered as per targets through implementation of new governance forums. Drive transformation of the central 3PM organisation as an integrated Specialised Nutrition Division with the cross functional teams (processes, people, tools and communication). Co-develop a strategy to build an agile and future-proof operations model by designing the 3PM manufacturing footprint to support strategic ambition & drive profitability (consolidation/optimisation)
profile_positions.title: 3PM Operations Projects Director

profile_positions.description: Responsible for defining  the manufacturing and co-manufacturing network, with the aim to provide the best sourcing of our finished products, and optimally support business growth, innovation and sustainable cost, embracing the end to end supply chain, from countries demand to manufacturing of the goods through leadership of a team of product sourcing managers.  Also responsible for driving the performance agenda on productivity in our internal Supply Points.
profile_positions.title: Head of Product Sourcing and Operations projects

profile_positions.description: Responsible for leading the On Time in Full End execution of innovations through business partnering and for ensuring the necessary capacity and capabilities are in place in all manufacturing sites globally.
profile_positions.title: Senior Global Innovation Planning Manager - Axe

profile_positions.description: Key position within the Local Brazilian operation, I am responsible for leading the S&OP process of the most profitable categories and leading the DP and deploy team for defining the forecast of more than 500 items across 7 distribution centres representing a turnover of approx 1.5b Euros.
profile_positions.title: Senior Demand Planning Manager

profile_positions.description: Senior Innovation and Governance planning Manager within the local supply chain organisation, responsible for leading a team of 14 individuals in the flawless implementation and execution of all the innovation projects for Brazil, cross categories. Developed and implemented a strategic vision for the innovation team through the re-structure of the innovation team, processes and ways of working with all the local and regional interfaces to become the best in class in Local Innovation Planning recognised by the Senior SC Leadership Team.
profile_positions.title: Senior Local Innovation Planning Manager for HPC, Foods, Ice & Water

profile_positions.description: SC leader and key member of cross functional innovation teams, responsible for delivering global innovation projects on time in full at the agreed cost and quality and for ensuring the necessary capacity and capabilities are in place in all manufacturing sites globally. Successfully delivered many brand/cross brand global innovation projects. Excellent project management skills and ability to hold people accountable were paramount to achieve the best technical execution of the marketing need within all production facilities. Responsible for long term capacity planning of materials and filling lines. Led the implementation of  Better Faster Innovation concept within the Deo category which was recognised by the SC Chief Officer.
profile_positions.title: Global Innovation and Strategic Planning Manager - Rexona

profile_positions.description:
• Successfully delivered global innovation projects by leading the SC work-streams, developing and maintaining network timings, recommending manufacturing and tooling configuration and preparing all supply chain decision papers for key innovation gate meeting.
•Monitored global capacity & demand of key strategic components to support growth plans and provided analysis to support recommendation for investment to deliver the best solution for Unilever.
•Provided a quarterly a global cost benchmarking report to highlight opportunities for cost saving and convergence opportunities for cross regional sourcing.
profile_positions.title: Global Innovation Planning Assistant Manager - Axe & Dove
